content.rendered:
Overview

With three towers and a clubhouse with beachfront, it is a tropical haven built with the vision of giving you the finest living experience, every day on Noida Expressway.

Enjoy your uniquely designed 3 and 4 bed bespoke homes to the fullest with Island themed landscape and robust 5-tier security. Here, every door opens into a magnificent world of possibilities in the lap of luxury, with an incredible view.

2 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

3 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

HIGHLIGHTS

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH A RESORT-LIKE LIFESTYLE

Live the way you would in a resort. It has all been designed to give you a relaxed outlook.

  • Located in Sector 146, Noida, an upcoming residential
    corridor that’s set to rise to prominence soon.
  • Short drive to key locations like Noida SEZ, the botanical garden, film city, and more.
  • Latest residential development in Sector 146, following
    the success of Sector 137, 143 and 150.
  • Just 5 Km from Advant Business Park in Sector 157.

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH WORLD-CLASS SPORTS FACILITIES

Be a sport for life with the sports facilities here; whatever be your preference, you have a choice.

  • A marquee location with enhanced connectivity to Delhi
    and other cities, just a 25–30 min drive away.
  • Close proximity to two international airports –
    Jewar International Airport and IGI International Airport,
    just an hour’s drive.
  • Easy connectivity to the three major expressways –
    Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, Yamuna Expressway
    and FNG Expressway.

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH AN ACTIVE SOCIAL LIFE

Love to mingle? This is the place for you. Whether it’s about old friends coming over or making new ones in the neighborhood, your social life is sure to thrive here.

  • Themed Residential Project
  • Bang on Noida Expressway
  • Near upcoming international cricket stadium.
  • 30 minutes drive to upcoming Jewar airport
  • 10 minutes drive to Knowledge Parks : 1, 2 & 3
  • 18 minutes from Mahamaya Flyover & Amity University
  • Expressway Facing Apartments
  •  Modular kitchen, VRV, Imported Marble (EOI Holders)
  •  Avail the pre booking benefits

FLOOR PLANS

LOCATION MAP

OPEN UP TO A GREAT LOCATION

With three towers and a clubhouse with beachfront, it is a tropical haven built with the vision of giving you the finest living experience, every day on Noida Expressway.

Enjoy your uniquely designed 3 and 4 bed bespoke homes to the fullest with Island themed landscape and robust 5-tier security. Here, every door opens into a magnificent world of possibilities in the lap of luxury, with an incredible view.

Site Address : Godrej Tropical Isle – Noida sec 146
